duties_responsibilities.duty: Service critical power equipment with advanced ability to interact and communicate information within the organization.
Use Microsoft Office products and self-project manage using MS Project or Excel.
Write test plans and reports detailing test results.
Work well with others and with a sense of urgency until the job is complete.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or Electrical Engineering Technology. Associates Degree with 2 or more years’ experience in servicing critical power equipment. High School Diploma/GED and 10 or more years’ experience will also be considered.
